answerText: distribution ratio [or distribution coefficient; or distribution constant][10] Many partition and distribution ratios for a compound are actually for the partitioning between water and this organic solvent. Hansch and Fujita are responsible for using this compound and water to model biological partitioning.
heading: ACF Regionals  |2012 | Seven Lakes/Rockefeller  | 16 | Science | Chemistry | College
subject: Science
question: Question: This is slightly more general than the sometimes interchanged partition ratio. For 10 points each: [10] Name this ratio of total solute concentration in the extraction phase to its total concentration in the originating phase.
